text:
hi guys :slightly_smiling_face:

I have created module with the button where its linking to other internal page, but the url from it is very long and include like some kind of redirection in it. I don't really know what can cause something like this.

example: <https://www.mindlinksoft.com/chat-engine/%7Burl=%7Btype=CONTENT,%20content_id=56240130655,%20href=https://www.mindlinksoft.com/mindlink-mobile%7D,%20open_in_new_tab=false,%20no_follow=false,%20sponsored=false,%20user_generated_content=false%7D|https://www.mindlinksoft.com/chat-engine/%7Burl=%7Btype=CONTENT,%20content_id=562401306[…]alse,%20sponsored=false,%20user_generated_content=false%7D>

Appreciate any help.
Hi David, did you find a solution for this? We're also having the same problem
I’m not sure the exact issue, I’d have to check it out, but generally I put a container around an svg and lock that width in there, make the svg be 100% width
Whatever your first field/property is inside that repeater is what will be displayed. So if you use like a title/text in there, then you can name them. so that page editors can understand better
Do you have a live link I can check out? I need a bit more detail or some screenshots to assist
